summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MetaSearch application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working correctly with search, admin features, and mobile responsiveness. Fixed game sources enablement issue during testing.

minor_issues.issue: Game sources were initially seeded as disabled (enabled: false)
minor_issues.impact: Game searches returned no results until sources were manually enabled
minor_issues.fix_applied: Manually enabled all game sources during testing
minor_issues.note: This may be intentional behavior or a seeding issue

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console

passed_tests: Get sources by type (game, movie, anime)
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider reviewing why game sources are seeded as disabled - may need to update seeding logic to ensure all sources start as enabled by default
